title: Sound On: Mick Mulvaney on Trump Future, Jan 6 Revelations (Radio)
itunes:title: Sound On: Mick Mulvaney on Trump Future, Jan 6 Revelations (Radio)
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.

Bloomberg Government Congress reporter Jack Fitzpatrick was today's host. Guests: Congresswoman Lois Frankel of Florida, former White House Acting Chief of Staff Mick Mulvaney and Bloomberg Politics Contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
